aboutme: Hi! My name is Lila Sarfson, and I’ve switched careers! I studied history at university and worked in archives for the last two years while studying web development.
how: I started by couriosity a course on web design, I loved it, and because of that I decided to jump into it with a fullstack bootcamp and now, here I am!
why: I’m a very creative person who loves learning new things, and I believe the IT sector offers endless opportunities for both. Web development has helped me shape a new way of thinking and problem-solving. That’s why I’m incredibly motivated to grow as a developer!
